message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to the price I was hoping for, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $11200.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. I'll make one more adjustment, but I think this is my final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $11150.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with $11100 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I think this is my final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $11200, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
